ygData.subject: RE: Staff of Observers
ygData.msgSnippet: The staff of the observer starts with  tough evil eye in Runny eye called Borxx ( I can solo her at 39 paladin ) she has the evil eye lens/observer lens all
ygData.messageBody:
The staff of the observer starts with tough evil eye in Runny eye called
Borxx ( I can solo her at 39 paladin ) she has the evil eye lens/observer
lens all the time. you them take that lens to an observery in Steamfont
mountains ( think I got the place named correctly ) its just north of the 3
windmills, there is someone there who will make the staff for you I have
forgotten her name.

Sorry to be so vague but its all out of memory.

Belzabar Kal'Torak
Paladin of the 40th year
Erollisi Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Gholrua Dalturak [mailto:gholrua@...]
Sent: Friday, 18 February 2000 07:40 am
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Staff of Observers


From: "Gholrua Dalturak" <gholrua@...>

Well, let's see if we can get this list going again. I'm a level 24 druid
on the Xegony server. I have heard alot of people talking about the Staff
of Observers. Is this a good quest for my level? If so, where does it
begin? I like to do all my own quests so I can know the history of the
items I have. Please let me know where to go or who to talk to to begin
this quest.

Thanks so much,

Fizzlebane Tangleroot of Rivervale
24th Circle Druid of Karana
Deputy of the Great Wall Patrol
Master Smith
Xegony
